name: The Gargoyle Landing
description:
Shoot the gargoyles with your laser to turn them to stone, then match the blocks to clear them. Don't run out of space!

Based on some feedback from the Ludum Dare 42, I've updated some things about the original Ludum Dare project (and created a stand alone to keep the original in tact).  Here's the ongoing updated version.

V1 - Added (from original Ludum Dare version): A full-grid snapping (no more half-grids); A battery life to the laser; Life counter for easier readability; Grey blocks that appear when blocks fall off cliff and that need to be next to matched colored blocks to clear; Waves to get a breather; Upgrade menu after each wave with Upgrades: laser spread, battery life, life max increase, speed increase, heal 3 life, clear all blocks, shoot through blocks, push harder/faster, and damage halved; Updated Hero art; Updated title art.
